Protecting the Rights of Shareholders.  ><- stripped tags -> NEW YORK , Sept. 4,   The following statement is being issued by Levi & Korsinsky, LLP: To: All Persons or Entities who purchased Pericom Semiconductor Corporation stock prior to September 2, 2015 . You are hereby notified that Levi & Korsinsky, LLP has commenced an investigation into the fairness of the sale of Pericom Semiconductor Corporation (NASDAQ: [[]]) to Diodes Corporation for $17.00 in cash per share. To learn more about the investigation and your rights, go to : [[]] or contact Joseph E.
